channel.title: Selling items back to shop on a 508 server?
channel.description: So I am working on my 508 project, and I am wondering how I can make it so that you can sell items to shops. My base is Tokkulscape v 3.5 if it helps. Thank-you in advance for those who answer.

item.title: Selling items back to shop on a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

Alrighty, thank-you I will ask someone else sir :).

Read full topic

item.title: Selling items back to shop on a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

ItemOption2:

case ###: //Find the case out for it sell(pShops.itemID,pShops.itemID.itemAMT); addItem(pShops.itemID.itemAMT*pShops.itemID.itemPRC, 995); break;
